amendment.description: An amendment numbered 116 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds from being made available to conduct or support gain of function research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
